properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 8:12PM CST until February 20 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City KS
properties.description:
...Widespread Light to Moderate Snow Tonight...

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to two inches.

* WHERE...Ellis County.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Expect areas of
reduced visibility tonight into early Thursday morning.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow covered roadways are expected for
the Thursday morning commute to work and school. Allow extra
time to reach your destination.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY
